sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' import avatar from '../assets/images/avatar.jpg' export const TourDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams() const tour = tourData.find(tour=> tour.id === id) const { photo, title, desc, price, reviews, city, address, distance, maxGroupSize } = tour const options = { day: 'numeric', month: 'long', year: 'numeric' } const { totalRating, avgRating} = calculateAvgRating (reviews) return ( <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ('Not rated') : (({reviews.length}))} {address}
{city} {price} /per person {distance} k/m {maxGroupSize} /people
Description

{desc}

{/* ============ TOUR REVIEWS SECTION START ============ */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
{ reviews?.map(review => (
Dinesh

{new Date("10-02-2024").toLocaleDateString('en-US', options)}

5
Amazing tour
)) } { reviews?.map(review => (
Dinesh

{new Date("10-02-2024").toLocaleDateString('en-US', options)}

5
Amazing tour
)) } {/* ============ TOUR REVIEWS SECTION END ============ */}
); };
